room_title: Escape room "The Morgue" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
review: Had a great time at Morgue! Will definitely be returning to try the other games. I would highly recommend this for double dates or just a fun night with friends! Wanted to add that the staff was exceptional! The gamemaster gave us great clues while still keeping it challenging. Excellent all around!

room_title: Escape room "The Morgue" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
review: My husband and I did “The Morgue” and it was challenging and exhilarating! A great team building experience. The staff was amazing! We plan on returning with a bigger group to try out the other rooms. Highly recommend this activity!

room_title: Escape room "The Morgue" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
review: Had a great time in the Morgue room. Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Morgue" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
review: This was the first escape room I've done and loved it! Our theme was a morgue and the rooms were decorated perfectly. Cheyenne did an amazing job guiding us when we got stuck. I can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Morgue" by Rugged Xscape in Lafayette (IN)
review: What a great time for a night with family! We escaped The Morgue and had a blast. Very well done!
